issue.title: www.bluestoneperennials.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.bluestoneperennials.com/plants/type/bulbs/genus/lily](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.bluestoneperennials.com%2Fplants%2Ftype%2Fbulbs%2Fgenus%2Flily) ### Comment > When I have AdGuard turned on, I will start scrolling on this website, and suddenly, the website is dim (an overlay), and I can't interact with the website anymore. If I refresh the page, I can begin interacting with the site again until I start to scroll and the website "dims" again. Once I turned AdGuard off (added this site to my allow list) and refreshed, it was evident to me that the "dimming" effect was the overlay used with the popup in the attached screenshot; however, AdGuard can block the email sign-up pop-up but not the overlay that accompanies it. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/p40zCa7.jpg)

issue.title: CRKT.com - Missing images (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.crkt.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected site:
`https://www.crkt.com/`

### Issue:
Many images are missing, due to a partially blocked/whitelisted cookie consent.

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rule:
`@@||cdn.cookielaw.org/consent`

### Possible fix:
```
- ||cdn.cookielaw.org/consent/*/OtAutoBlock.js$important,domain=shop.elsevier.de|otomoto.pl|olx.ro
+ ||cdn.cookielaw.org/consent/*/OtAutoBlock.js$important,domain=crkt.com|shop.elsevier.de|otomoto.pl|olx.ro
```

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v113.0.1-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.49.2

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
